body: Hopefully translators wait until poncocchan's book comes out so the terrible whiteout censoring of Comic Aun will be removed. I CAN WAIT.

I've read fellatio focused works before but I have to say that for some weird reason that I can't explain this would be the first one to make me hard. Not fue, andou hiroyuki or the great seto yuuki made me hard with fellatio draws allone. And I consider those artists better than this one but for some reason this was the one to make me hard with fellatio allone XD
Poncocchan is just in another level ! !
